com.foreach.across.modules.spring.security.actions

Class AuthorityMatchingAllowableActions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.spring.security.actions.AuthorityMatchingAllowableActions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AllowableActions, Iterable<AllowableAction>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthorityMatchingAllowableActions.AuthenticationAuthorityMatchingAllowableActions, AuthorityMatchingAllowableActions.CollectionAuthorityMatchingAllowableActions, AuthorityMatchingAllowableActions.SecurityPrincipalAuthorityMatchingAllowableActions

    public abstract class AuthorityMatchingAllowableActions
extends Object
implements AllowableActions
    Implementation of AllowableActions that takes a map of AllowableAction and AuthorityMatcher as input.

    Every action requested will be checked against the actual authorities provides. This class is an abstract providing nested implementations easily constructed through static helper methods.

    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
